title: Security Breach Incident
corrective_action: Reset passwords and notified affected users.
correction_details: Access policies updated and audits scheduled.
corrective_details: Users informed with guidelines to secure their accounts.
investigation_details: Investigated the source of breach.
collection_of_evidence: Logs and system snapshots collected.

title: Quality Control Incident
corrective_action: Recalled defective units and issued replacements.
correction_details: Tested new process in controlled environment.
corrective_details: Customer service briefed on handling complaints.
investigation_details: Conducted root cause analysis.
collection_of_evidence: Collected faulty product samples.

title: Privacy Incident
description: Data leak due to misconfigured database.
corrective_action: Notified affected users and provided credit monitoring.
correction_details: Reviewed access logs and implemented encryption.
corrective_details: Drafted communication to inform users and regulatory bodies.
investigation_details: Identified exposed data and its extent.
collection_of_evidence: Logged access and identified responsible parties.

title: Security Incident
corrective_action: Reset compromised credentials and conducted security training.
associated_impacts: Unauthorized access to corporate email accounts.
correction_details: Deployed security patches and updated phishing detection rules.
corrective_details: Educated employees on identifying phishing attempts.
investigation_details: Identified compromised accounts and access points.
collection_of_evidence: Captured phishing emails and network traffic.

title: Quality Control Incident
description: Faulty component discovered in product assembly.
corrective_action: Recalled affected batches and implemented stricter inspections.
correction_details: Improved quality control measures in assembly line.
corrective_details: Revised production schedule to recover delays.
investigation_details: Examined assembly records to identify root cause.
collection_of_evidence: Collected faulty component samples for analysis.
